tool.name: Kraken2

param.name: kmer_len
param.label: K-mer length in BP

param.name: minimizer_len
param.label: Minimizer length

param.name: minimizer_spaces
param.label: Minimizer spaces

param.name: load_factor
param.label: Load factor
param.help: Proportion of the hash table to be populated

param.name: clean
param.label: Clean up extra files. Note: If the extra files are removed this DB cannot be used to build a bracken DB!

xml.name: minusb
xml.option: MinusB (archaea, viral, plasmid, human, UniVec_Core; ~8 GB)

xml.name: standard
xml.option: Standard-Full (archaea, bacteria, viral, plasmid, human, UniVec_Core; ~50 GB)

xml.name: standard_08gb
xml.option: Standard-8 (Standard with DB capped at 8 GB)

xml.name: standard_16gb
xml.option: Standard-16 (Standard with DB capped at 16 GB)

xml.name: pluspf
xml.option: PlusPF (Standard plus protozoa and fungi; ~50 GB)

xml.name: pluspf_08gb
xml.option: PlusPF-8 (PlusPF with DB capped at 8 GB; ~7.5 GB)

xml.name: pluspf_16gb
xml.option: PlusPF-16 (PlusPF with DB capped at 16 GB; ~15 GB)

xml.name: pluspfp
xml.option: PlusPFP (Standard plus protozoa, fungi and plant; ~129 GB)

xml.name: pluspfp_08gb
xml.option: PlusPFP-8 (PlusPFP with DB capped at 8 GB; ~7.5 GB)

xml.name: pluspfp_16gb
xml.option: PlusPFP-16 (PlusPFP with DB capped at 16 GB; ~15 GB)

xml.name: core_nt
xml.option: core_nt (Very large collection, inclusive of GenBank, RefSeq, TPA and PDB; ~182 GB)
